WorkItem.ClosedComment: fixed in source - 2.2.14 will be out shortly
WorkItem.Description: Level 80 untalented hunter base stamina is 187, not 127 as indicated; similarly, with my talents agility is 218 and stamina 205, vice 214 and 127 respectively.

Comments.Message: difference of 60 stam, are you sure you didnt check Toughness?

I don't have Toughness anymore, so I didn't look, but now that you mention it, Toughness isn't available as a buff option; also, having Toughness would add stamina, not remove it.  Though one can't tell unless the attached file is opened, my talent spec includes 5 levels of Survivalist, so Stamina should go up by 10%, not stay the same.

(the current hunter release is largely broken. many calculations are still for level 70. the next release will hopefully address many of these issues. i do not suggest you use the hunter module in 2.2.12)

you uploaded a profile for a talented 80 night-elf hunter

base (untalented) night elf hunter stats: 186 agi, 127 sta
2.2.12 says:  186 agi, 127 sta (correct)
SVN-latest says: 186 agi, 127 sta (correct)

remember that base stats are different for each race.

If you're saying that you get 187 in-game, then check for passive abilities (like toughness) or area-wide buffs.

when i load your profile in, i get this:

2.2.12: 214 agi, 127 sta (wrong)
SVN-latest: 217 agi, 139 sta (the spreadsheet agrees)

are you saying these don't match the in-game (and you're not buffed), then i'd be quite surprised
pasted in the wrong comment when closing this - it's not a bug
